channel.title: Why the ****
channel.description:
Why the **** did you remove the rep limit?
EDIT: Why the **** did you [u]add[/u] the rep limit?

item.title: Why the ****
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Not when squirtle makes fun of you on IRC. But thats a pokebattle for another game.

Read full topic

item.title: Why the ****
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:5, topic:336171”][quote author=Niall link=topic=432551.msg3175823#msg3175823 date=1270840613]

Why the **** did you remove the rep limit?

EDIT:
Why the **** did you add the rep limit?

The limit was added because people were getting 800+ rep for no reason at all. You guys give rep for almost anything.
[/quote]
+1 for squirtle[/quote]
+1 for lapras, who is like over 9000 times better then squirtle

Read full topic
